perturbation.original_text: 9. Compensation (a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to pay Individual a royalty (the "Royalty") equal to $0.02 for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name, last name or other identifying personal characteristics; provided, however, the Royalty will cease being paid upon the death of Individual. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty will not exceed $50,000 in any month. All undisputed Royalty payments shall be made in U.S. dollars in cash or to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar month for sales during the previous month.
perturbation.changed_text: 9. Compensation (a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to pay Individual a royalty (the "Royalty") equal to $0.02 for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name, last name or other identifying personal characteristics; provided, however, the Royalty will cease being paid upon the death of Individual. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty will not exceed $50,000 in any month. All undisputed Royalty payments shall be made in U.S. dollars in cash or to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within sixty (60) days after the end of each calendar month for sales during the previous month.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that payments are due within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar month. The changed text modifies this to sixty (60) days, creating a direct contradiction regarding the payment deadline, making it unclear when the payment is actually due.

perturbation.original_text: All undisputed Royalty payments shall be made in U.S. dollars in cash or to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar month for sales during the previous month.
perturbation.changed_text: All undisputed Royalty payments shall be made in U.S. dollars in cash or to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar month for sales during the previous month. However, Lifeway reserves the right to defer payment for up to ninety (90) days in cases of unforeseen financial hardship.
perturbation.explanation: The original text establishes a clear payment deadline of thirty (30) days. The changed text adds a clause that allows Lifeway to defer payment for up to ninety (90) days in cases of unforeseen financial hardship. This directly contradicts the initial thirty-day deadline, creating uncertainty about the actual payment timeframe and the conditions under which the deadline can be extended.

perturbation.original_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, perpetual, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-free, right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, perpetual, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-free, right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Lifeway's rights under this section are limited to a period of five (5) years from the Effective Date.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants Lifeway a perpetual license to use the Individual's name and likeness. The added sentence limits Lifeway's rights to five (5) years from the Effective Date, creating a contradiction between the perpetual nature of the license initially granted and the imposed five-year limitation. This contradiction creates ambiguity about the duration of the license and raises questions about its enforceability beyond the initial five-year period.
